meanings.definition: A substance that destroys or inhibits the growth of fungi.
meanings.sent1: The antifungals in the spray helped get rid of the mold in the bathroom.
meanings.sent2: Doctors prescribed antifungals to treat the athlete's foot infection.
meanings.sent3: The antifungals worked so well that the mushrooms in the garden started shrinking!
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was like powerful antifungals against the doubts in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The antifungals acted like tiny warriors, battling the fungal invaders in the body.

meanings.definition: Medications used to treat fungal infections.
meanings.sent1: She took antifungals every day to fight off the stubborn yeast infection.
meanings.sent2: The pharmacist recommended antifungals for the ringworm on the cat's fur.
meanings.sent3: The antifungals were so effective that even the mushrooms in the soup disappeared!
meanings.sent4: The antifungals were like magic pills, making the fungal infection vanish overnight.
meanings.sent5: The antifungals were the heroes in the battle against the invading fungi.
